mapper.insert: INSERT INTO image ( image_no, main_image, org_name, save_name, path, file_size, file_ext, from_tb, from_no, reg_dt ) VALUES ( IMAGE_SEQ.nextval, #{mainImage}, #{orgName}, #{saveName}, #{path}, #{fileSize}, #{fileExt}, #{fromTb}, #{fromNo}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT image_no AS imageNo, main_image AS mainImage, org_name AS orgName, save_name AS saveName, path AS path, file_size AS fileSize, file_ext AS fileExt, from_tb AS fromTb, from_no AS fromNo, reg_dt AS regDt FROM image WHERE from_tb = #{fromTb} AND from_no = #{fromNo}
